issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Netty channel buffer size is hard-coded 128KB now. It should be made configurable.
fields.summary: LlapOutputFormatService should have a configurable send buffer size

comments.body: [~jdere] I have tested this patch locally and this conf seems to work fine. Although I am seeing different set of errors possibly because of other errors. I will create bugs for them later. Can you please review this patch?
[~jdere] Addressed your review comments in this patch.

The changes look good, +1.
One question, was it intentional to change the tez version in the pom.xml?
ah! That was not intentional. I removed it from the patch.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12803888/HIVE-13751.2.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to build exiting with an error
